General.Name: Argan S.A.
General.Description: Argan SA engages in designing, building, developing, owning, leasing, and managing logistical platforms in France. It is also involved in the development and management of land. The company's real estate property consists of a total area of 806,000 square meters. It serves shippers and logistics companies. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Neuilly sur Seine, France.
General.Address: 21, rue Beffroy, Neuilly sur Seine, France, 92200
